    • GUIInput

      public GUIInput​(java.lang.String startTxt, int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean pageLoader)
      Construct a GUIInput
      Parameters:
      startTxt - starting text filled in to the input field
      x - x position of this GUIInput
      y - y position of this GUIInput
      width - width of this GUIInput
      height - height of this GUIInput
      pageLoader - boolean signaling if this GUIInput is a pageLoader
